Reviews.Title: Great Package Deal
Reviews.Author: ariaziz
Reviews.Content: This package is worth every penny. I shopped around and if all the components were purchased separately by any of the major retailers it would have cost hundreds more.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but accessories not that impressive
Reviews.Author: Shamesh Joshi
Reviews.Content: Camera is good one. I liked the functionality. But other accessories are not as per par.I hate Stand. It felt so rough and not of any quality.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: is an unprecedented camera, you can explore your creativity and take the best pictures of your life. I'm happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Venkata S Dandamudi
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for starters. Picture quality is great. Have to still explore video and graphic modes, but so far very satisfied with product.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mark C. Munsey
Reviews.Content: Excellent product made a great gift and produces a great picture of professional quality We are thoroughly enjoying this camera

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Camila Duarte de Azevedo
Reviews.Content: i love my Nikon D5100 16.2MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX "VR" and 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED IF AF-S DX "VR" Zoom-Nikkor Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D5100 16.2MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3-inch Vari-Angle LCD Monitor - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens - Nikon 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED IF AF-S DX VR Zoom-Nikkor Lenses - Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - Additional EN-EL14 Reachargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! Mini HDMI to standard HDMI cable - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5100 16.2MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX "VR" and 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED IF AF-S DX "VR" Zoom-Nikkor Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
